text: 'Cangjie programming language_nothing_nothing_type': 'In Cangjie code language, The Nothing type in Cangjie is a special type that contains no values. It is a subtype of all other types. Expressions of type Nothing indicate that the execution will not continue normally beyond that point.'

'Cangjie programming language_nothing_nothing_constraints': 'In Cangjie code language, The Nothing type has the following constraints:
It cannot be used explicitly in type annotations.
It is only used implicitly in control flow expressions like break, continue, return, and throw.'
